_header: Our Father that art in heaven

BLCottCleoBVI.First Lines:
Ure fadir þat hare in heuenehalged be þi
                    name…
BLCottCleoBVI.Note:
The MS has been refoliated several times. The folio number here refers
                    to the most recent, written in the bottom right corner of each recto folio.
                    Written as prose.
